mapper.insert: insert into flight( flight_id, flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time, flight_time, departure_airport, arrival_airport, user_id, flight_price, flight_status ) values( flight_seq.nextval, #{flightNumber}, #{departureTime}, #{arrivalTime}, #{flightTime}, #{departureAirport}, #{arrivalAirport}, #{userId}, #{flightPrice}, #{flightStatus} )
mapper.select: select * from flight order by flight_id asc
mapper.update: update flight set flight_number = #{flightNumber}, departure_time = #{departureTime}, arrival_time = #{arrivalTime}, flight_time = #{flightTime}, departure_airport = #{departureAirport}, arrival_airport = #{arrivalAirport}, flight_price = #{flightPrice}, flight_status = #{flightStatus} where flight_id = #{flightId}
mapper.select: select * from flight where instr(${column}, #{keyword}) > 0 order by ${column} asc
